hero.title: Transform Your Screen
hero.subtitle: Discover and set stunning wallpapers with just a tap

mobile.title: Mobile Optimized
mobile.description: Perfectly sized wallpapers for your device, every time.

collection.title: Vast Collection
collection.description: Thousands of high-quality wallpapers across various categories.

updates.title: Daily Updates
updates.description: Fresh wallpapers added daily to keep your screen exciting.

interface.title: Intuitive Interface
interface.description: Browse through our vast collection of wallpapers with ease. Our app's sleek design makes finding and setting your perfect wallpaper a breeze.

oneTab.title: One-Tap Apply
oneTab.description: Found a wallpaper you love? Apply it to your device with just one tap. It's that simple!

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.description: The more you use WallpaperWizard, the better it gets at suggesting wallpapers you'll love.

showcase.title: Showcase Your Art
showcase.description: Share your unique wallpaper designs with millions of users worldwide.

earn.title: Earn Revenue
earn.description: Get paid for your creativity. Earn money every time your wallpaper is downloaded.

grow.title: Grow Your Fanbase
grow.description: Build a following and connect with other artists in our vibrant community.

roadmap.title: Our Exciting Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Explore the future directions of WallpaperWizard

clients.subtitle: Bringing the WallpaperWizard experience to all devices

mobile.title: Mobile Version
mobile.description: We will launch the mobile version first, allowing you to discover beautiful wallpapers anytime and anywhere. Android will be released later than iOS.

next-step.title: Next Step
next-step.description: After the mobile version, we will expand to other platforms, including tablets, desktops, smart TVs, and more.

tablet.title: Tablet Version
tablet.description: Optimized for larger screens, bringing your favorite wallpapers to your tablet.

browser.title: Browser Extension
browser.description: Quickly access WallpaperWizard from your browser to find and apply wallpapers.

desktop.title: Desktop Version
desktop.description: WallpaperWizard for your computer, synced with your mobile experience.

tv.title: Smart TV App
tv.description: Transform your living room with stunning wallpapers on your smart TV.

visionOS.title: VisionOS Version
visionOS.description: Step into the future with WallpaperWizard for Apple's VisionOS.

in-future.title: More Clients
in-future.description: More devices (including tvOS, visionOS, Android TV) are in the works, so stay tuned.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Create your own channel and get your exclusive benefits.

profit.title: Profits
profit.description: Earn money from your creations. The more downloads, the more you earn.

profile.title: Creator Profiles
profile.description: Assist creators in creating a website that showcases you. Your fans can get your updates here. It is also a place where you can interact with fans.

in-future.title: More Features
in-future.description: More features are in development, including a creator marketplace, mentorship program, and more.

creatorProfiles.title: Creator Profiles
creatorProfiles.description: Showcase your portfolio and attract more followers.

communityEvents.title: Community Events
communityEvents.description: Participate in online and offline events to interact with other creators.

mentorshipProgram.title: Mentorship Program
mentorshipProgram.description: Experienced creators guide newcomers, fostering community growth.

challengesAndContests.title: Challenges and Contests
challengesAndContests.description: Participate in regular creative challenges to win rewards and recognition.

UI/UX.title: UI/UX Optimization
UI/UX.description: Continuously optimize user experience, making your experience more enjoyable.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Switch to dark mode for a more comfortable viewing experience, especially at night.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Support for multiple languages to cater to a global audience.

widget.title: Widget
widget.description: Quickly view and apply wallpapers with our convenient widget.

browser.title: Browser Integrated
browser.description: Browse major public wallpapers in our client to find wallpapers you like.

composer.title: Wallpaper Composer
composer.description: Create your own wallpapers with our easy-to-use composer tool.

not-only-wp.title: Not Only Wallpapers
not-only-wp.description: We also introduce ring tones, themes, and more features to make your device more personalized.

download.title: Ready to Transform Your Screen?
download.subtitle: Download WallpaperWizard now and give your device a fresh look!

testflight.tooltip: Didn't receive an invitation? Click the link to find out how to get an invitation.
